verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he does n’t “ really believe ” the midterms are as important as his 2016 victory , though they could derail his presidency] .

Trump said he does n’t “ really believe ” [ARG1: the midterms] [V: are] [ARG2: as important as his 2016 victory] , though they could derail his presidency .
Trump said he does n’t “ really believe ” the midterms are as important as his 2016 victory , though they [V: could] derail his presidency .
